| [Feature](./engine-core.feature.md)                                                         | <p>Feature instances define an area of functionality of an app. Each has a unique string ID, and may expose a public API containing services and slots. It also contains a list of all dependencies, meaning other Feature instances, to use their APIs.</p><p>When calling <code>runEngineApp</code> and providing it with a Feature\[\], it uses the definitions to initialize a <code>RuntimeFeature</code> for each.</p> |
